• Paperclip Tutorial – Detailed (resize via proc?! neat!) tutorial, if you are still using attachment_fu, now is the time to upgrade.
  • 7 CSS tips to make your life easier – TADA! life.easier.increase
  • JRuby on Google App engine, first impression – nice to know, most likely i’ll never use that.
  • Filesystem access with javascript – i have no idea how it successfully get’s out of the sandbox, but hey, it’s there if i’ll ever need it.
  • Centering a Div – one of the world’s greatest secrets, is now revealed. (yes, vertically too).
  • Rails Job board – for those of us who need it.
